channel.title: configuration on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in configuration on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: ps_mainmenu - Configure Menu Top Link
item.description: ps_mainmenu - Configure Menu Top Link Details Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-7268 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO> IMPROVE> Module manager Module manager page is well displayed Search mainmenu On Theme modules Main menu module is displayed Click on Main menu configure button. Configure> Main menu page is well displayed. Go to Menu Top Link, select the first item of Selected Items Only Accessories item is selected.

item.title: ps_mainmenu - Configure Add a new link
item.description: ps_mainmenu - Configure Add a new link Details Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-7269 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO> IMPROVE> Module manager Module manager page is well displayed Search mainmenu On Theme modules Main menu module is displayed Click on Main menu configure button. Configure> Main menu page is well displayed. Go to Main menu> Update link, fill the form, save. The link has been added.
